00035 // constructor
00036 wxRubberBand::wxRubberBand(wxWindow *wnd)
00037 {
00038         // we init all internal values
00039         RubberInitValues ();
00040         // we store the wnd 
00041         theWnd = wnd;   
00042 }
00043 
00044 // destructor
00045 wxRubberBand::~wxRubberBand()
00046 {
00047         // do nothing for the moment
00048 }
00049 
00050 void wxRubberBand::RubberInitValues()
00051 {
00052         
00053         // init member data
00054         theOldRubberRect = wxRect(0,0,0,0);
00055         SetPen ();
00056 
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 void wxRubberBand::SetGeometry(int x, int y, int width, int height)
00061 {
00062         
00063                 wxClientDC MyDC(theWnd);
00064                 MyDC.SetLogicalFunction (wxINVERT);
00065                 // draw lines
00066                 MyDC.SetPen (thePen);
00067                 if (VerifyRubberLines(x,y,width,height)) // must be not null see documentation
00068                         DrawRectangleLines (&MyDC,x,y,width,height);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void wxRubberBand::DrawRectangleLines(wxDC * MyDC,int x, int y, int width, int height)
00072 {
00073         // dessine new lines
00074         MyDC->DrawLine (x,y, x+width,y);                                // top segment
00075         MyDC->DrawLine (x+width,y,x+width,y+height);    // right segment
00076         MyDC->DrawLine (x+width,y+height,x,y+height);   // bottom segment
00077         MyDC->DrawLine (x,y+height,x,y);                                // left segment
00078 
00079         // Erase old line if theOldRubberRect != 0
00080         if (!theOldRubberRect.IsEmpty())
00081         {
00082         MyDC->DrawLine (theOldRubberRect.x,theOldRubberRect.y, 
00083                 theOldRubberRect.x+theOldRubberRect.width,theOldRubberRect.y);  // top segment
00084         MyDC->DrawLine (theOldRubberRect.x+theOldRubberRect.width,theOldRubberRect.y,
00085                 theOldRubberRect.x+theOldRubberRect.width,theOldRubberRect.y+theOldRubberRect.height);  // right segment
00086         MyDC->DrawLine (theOldRubberRect.x+theOldRubberRect.width,
00087                 theOldRubberRect.y+theOldRubberRect.height,theOldRubberRect.x,
00088                 theOldRubberRect.y+theOldRubberRect.height);    // bottom segment
00089         MyDC->DrawLine (theOldRubberRect.x,theOldRubberRect.y+theOldRubberRect.height,
00090                 theOldRubberRect.x,theOldRubberRect.y);                         // left segment
00091         }
00092         theOldRubberRect.x = x;
00093         theOldRubberRect.y = y;
00094         theOldRubberRect.width = width;
00095         theOldRubberRect.height = height;
00096 
00097 }
00098 void wxRubberBand::SetPen()
00099 {
00100         wxPen pen(*wxBLACK,1,wxDOT);
00101         thePen = pen;
00102         
00103 }
00104 
00105 bool wxRubberBand::VerifyRubberLines(int x, int y, int width, int height)
00106 {
00107         if (x < 0 || y < 0)
00108                 return FALSE;
00109         if (width <= 0 || height <= 0)
00110                 return FALSE;
00111         return TRUE;
00112 
00113 }
00114 
00115 void wxRubberBand::SetPen(wxPen &pen)
00116 {
00117         thePen = pen;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void wxRubberBand::ClearOldRubberRect()
00121 {
00122         theOldRubberRect = wxRect (0,0,0,0);
00123 }
